css: .print-format .table-bordered td, .print-format .table-bordered th {    border: 1px solid black;}.print-format th {    color: black;    font-weight: normal;    border-bottom-width: 1px !important;}.print-format .table-bordered {    border: 1px solid black;}.print-format td, .print-format th {    padding: 3px !important;     }.print-format .letter-head {    margin-bottom: 10px;}

name: Gate Pass

html:
TO,

{{ doc.employee_name or "" }}

{{ doc.employee or "" }}


Congratulations

Subject: LETTER OF INCREMENT.

In Recognition of your performance for the year {{ (doc.date or "")[:4] }}, we are pleased to award you an increment of rupees {{ doc.increment_amount or "" }} RS. per month and accordingly your restructured compensation (CTC) shall be rupees {{ doc.current_ctc or "" }} RS. per annum. The details of your revised CTC is given in annexure A".

We appreciate your contribution for the organization and hope you will continue to strive for better results. we also hope that you would shoulder higher responsibilities with utmost sincerity and dedication. we have a firm belief that improvement has no boundaries and expect that in coming years too you will work hard to achieve much higher standard of performance.

We are happy to have you as an integral part of ADVANTIS QUARTZ LLP family.


Your Sincerely




E.E: Annexure A"
name: Increment Letter
